about_the_game:
Hanctt is a continent covered in fog. Surviving on this continent is almost impossible. Detective Gab, the protagonist of the story, will find himself surrendering to dark magic within the sects.

Sometimes even killing may not be enough. For that reason, don't forget to strengthen your weapons. Your melee weapons may be more powerful than you think.

Witness the 4 main stories and the experiences of 4 different characters in the Hanctt Continent!

  • Inspirations from the true classics

Hanctt Origins is inspired by the true classics. It has been transformed into a Modern FPS Shooter by adding concepts such as environmental designs and gameplay.

  • Various combat styles

There are many types of weapons in Hanctt Origins, from a sheriff's revolver to a giant rocket launcher. For example, you can reflect back matrix style bullets with a katana :)

  • Level designs worthy of H.P. Lovecraft

We designed the level designs inspired by Lovecraft's novels. You will experience many emotions together in these maps.

  • Unique art style

We blended our art style with 8-way sprites and a palette worthy of the Lovecraft theme.

Improve your gameplay style with different weapons. There are different weapons in Hanctt Origins, and these weapons are shaped according to your playing style. If you want to specialize in close combat in the game, you should tend accordingly.

You can add innovation to your gameplay style by unlocking special power-ups for weapons from the skill tree.

The theme of the game will be a gothic theme. Throughout the game, fog and gloom will make the player feel like he is always alone in the game. The game, which adopts the Cthulhu mythology, will also include many references to this mythology. The game consists of 8 different regions and the gameplay will take place around these regions. Our hero will start his journey in Modkefn and finish it in the barren and cursed Hanctt regions. Each region has its own unique enemy types.

More About Hanctt Origins (THE HANCTT BIBLE)

Main Story

The calm and quiet days of Yud Town, Lornde Police Station, where Gab worked, were shaken by a murder. Among his routine duties, Gab left his office at the police station and went to meet his wife, Lina, who shares the same profession with him. Lina gave him details about the summary of the incident; They were found in the middle of a murder for which Captain Bergerson was taken into custody. Gab went down to the holding cell, full of curiosity and questions.

Bergerson shared with Gab ancient secrets and mysterious information about the continent of Hanctt. Gab took a tour around the town and reached the scene of the murder. The police were carrying out a detailed study together with the crime scene investigation team. While Lina took the lead as crime scene investigation manager, Gab made efforts to search for clues.

As they moved towards the port under Gab's guidance, Lina noticed a glow... Gab's eyes darkened and then she found herself on the other side of the interrogation table, that is, on the criminal side. Police officers began asking him questions about the murder, but Gab was unable to answer due to the shock of the incident. His colleagues decided to expel Gab from his profession because they thought Lina had been murdered, but they did not have enough evidence.

Gab decided that the only way out was to cooperate with Bergerson and go to the Hanctt continent. On the continent of Hanctt, in the Ludtern region, his main mission focused on finding his mate. This was Gab's evolution of what was initially a simple murder investigation into a complex story that took him on a journey deep into the Hanctt continent.

name: Hanctt Origins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce MX130
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Hanctt Origins is a dark retro FPS straight out of the Lovecraft novels. Witness our character complete his journey on the Hanctt continent.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
